context: good evening to you! I am a movie seeker I want to watch something tonight with my friends we love to laugh
Me, too! I love all kinds of movies.
and also to get scared or on edge please name me a few titles
I recently watched Happy Death Day (2017) I thought it was pretty good!
yes I like Taken 2 (2012) that was a good one I also like Deadpool (2016) and Fun with Dick and Jane (2005)
resp: Yes! The Taken (2008) movies are good. So is Deadpool (2016) . I heard the second one is awesome.
